profile.bio: PhD in Computer Science with 10+ years experience in machine learning and data analytics. Former Google AI researcher.
Full-stack developer and former Facebook engineer with expertise in React, Node.js, and modern web technologies.
AI researcher and Stanford graduate specializing in deep learning, computer vision, and natural language processing.
AWS Solutions Architect with 8+ years experience in cloud infrastructure, DevOps, and distributed systems.
Cybersecurity expert and ethical hacker with certifications in CISSP, CEH, and extensive experience in security auditing.

courses.title: Complete Python Programming Bootcamp
courses.description: Master Python from basics to advanced topics including OOP, web scraping, data analysis, and automation. Build real-world projects and prepare for Python developer roles.

courses.title: Data Science with Machine Learning
courses.description: Comprehensive course covering statistics, data visualization, machine learning algorithms, and real-world data science projects using Python and R.

courses.title: Full Stack Web Development
courses.description: Build modern web applications using React, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB. Learn front-end and back-end development with hands-on projects.

courses.title: Artificial Intelligence Fundamentals
courses.description: Introduction to AI concepts, neural networks, deep learning, and practical applications. Includes projects in computer vision and natural language processing.

courses.title: Cloud Computing with AWS
courses.description: Master Amazon Web Services including EC2, S3, RDS, Lambda, and deployment strategies. Prepare for AWS certification and cloud architect roles.

courses.title: Cybersecurity Essentials
courses.description: Learn network security, ethical hacking, penetration testing, and security best practices. Includes hands-on labs and real-world scenarios.

courses.title: MongoDB Database Mastery
courses.description: Complete guide to MongoDB including document modeling, queries, aggregation pipelines, indexing, and performance optimization for modern applications.

courses.title: Mobile App Development with Flutter
courses.description: Build cross-platform mobile applications using Flutter and Dart. Create iOS and Android apps with a single codebase and deploy to app stores.

lessons.title: Control structures: loops and conditionals
lessons.content: In this lesson, you'll learn about control structures: loops and conditionals. We'll cover the fundamental concepts, best practices, and provide hands-on examples to reinforce your understanding. By the end of this lesson, you'll be able to apply these concepts in real-world programming scenarios.

lessons.title: Functions and modules in Python
lessons.content: In this lesson, you'll learn about functions and modules in python. We'll cover the fundamental concepts, best practices, and provide hands-on examples to reinforce your understanding. By the end of this lesson, you'll be able to apply these concepts in real-world programming scenarios.

lessons.title: Statistics fundamentals for data science
lessons.content: This lesson focuses on statistics fundamentals for data science in the context of data science. You'll explore practical applications, work with real datasets, and understand how this concept fits into the broader data science workflow. We'll use Python libraries and tools to demonstrate key concepts.

lessons.title: Data visualization with matplotlib and seaborn
lessons.content: This lesson focuses on data visualization with matplotlib and seaborn in the context of data science. You'll explore practical applications, work with real datasets, and understand how this concept fits into the broader data science workflow. We'll use Python libraries and tools to demonstrate key concepts.

lessons.title: Pandas for data manipulation and analysis
lessons.content: This lesson focuses on pandas for data manipulation and analysis in the context of data science. You'll explore practical applications, work with real datasets, and understand how this concept fits into the broader data science workflow. We'll use Python libraries and tools to demonstrate key concepts.

lessons.title: HTML5 and CSS3 fundamentals
lessons.content: Learn html5 and css3 fundamentals for modern web development. This lesson covers both theoretical concepts and practical implementation. You'll build interactive examples and understand how to integrate these concepts into full-stack applications.

lessons.title: JavaScript ES6+ features and syntax
lessons.content: Learn javascript es6+ features and syntax for modern web development. This lesson covers both theoretical concepts and practical implementation. You'll build interactive examples and understand how to integrate these concepts into full-stack applications.

lessons.title: React components and state management
lessons.content: Learn react components and state management for modern web development. This lesson covers both theoretical concepts and practical implementation. You'll build interactive examples and understand how to integrate these concepts into full-stack applications.

lessons.title: Introduction to artificial intelligence
lessons.content: Explore introduction to artificial intelligence in artificial intelligence and machine learning. This lesson combines theoretical foundations with practical implementation using popular frameworks like TensorFlow and PyTorch. You'll work on real AI projects and understand the mathematical concepts behind the algorithms.

lessons.title: Neural network architecture and training
lessons.content: Explore neural network architecture and training in artificial intelligence and machine learning. This lesson combines theoretical foundations with practical implementation using popular frameworks like TensorFlow and PyTorch. You'll work on real AI projects and understand the mathematical concepts behind the algorithms.

lessons.title: Deep learning with TensorFlow and Keras
lessons.content: Explore deep learning with tensorflow and keras in artificial intelligence and machine learning. This lesson combines theoretical foundations with practical implementation using popular frameworks like TensorFlow and PyTorch. You'll work on real AI projects and understand the mathematical concepts behind the algorithms.

lessons.title: Cloud computing fundamentals and service models
lessons.content: Master cloud computing fundamentals and service models in cloud environments. This lesson covers AWS services, best practices for cloud architecture, and hands-on labs to reinforce learning. You'll understand how to implement scalable and cost-effective cloud solutions.

lessons.title: AWS EC2 instances and virtual machines
lessons.content: Master aws ec2 instances and virtual machines in cloud environments. This lesson covers AWS services, best practices for cloud architecture, and hands-on labs to reinforce learning. You'll understand how to implement scalable and cost-effective cloud solutions.

lessons.title: Storage solutions: S3, EBS, and EFS
lessons.content: Master storage solutions: s3, ebs, and efs in cloud environments. This lesson covers AWS services, best practices for cloud architecture, and hands-on labs to reinforce learning. You'll understand how to implement scalable and cost-effective cloud solutions.

lessons.title: Network security principles and protocols
lessons.content: Understand network security principles and protocols from a cybersecurity perspective. This lesson covers threat assessment, security protocols, and practical defense strategies. You'll learn to identify vulnerabilities and implement security measures to protect systems and data.

lessons.title: Vulnerability assessment and penetration testing
lessons.content: Understand vulnerability assessment and penetration testing from a cybersecurity perspective. This lesson covers threat assessment, security protocols, and practical defense strategies. You'll learn to identify vulnerabilities and implement security measures to protect systems and data.

lessons.title: Cryptography and secure communication
lessons.content: Understand cryptography and secure communication from a cybersecurity perspective. This lesson covers threat assessment, security protocols, and practical defense strategies. You'll learn to identify vulnerabilities and implement security measures to protect systems and data.

assignments.title: Create a personal expense tracker application
assignments.description: Complete a create a personal expense tracker application project that demonstrates your understanding of programming concepts covered in class. This assignment will test your ability to write clean, efficient code and implement best practices.
assignments.instructions: Submit your code in a GitHub repository with a README file explaining your approach. Include unit tests and documentation. Code should follow PEP 8 style guidelines.

assignments.title: Build a predictive model for stock prices
assignments.description: Your task is to build a predictive model for stock prices using the techniques and tools we've discussed. You'll need to clean data, perform analysis, create visualizations, and present your findings in a clear, professional manner.
assignments.instructions: Submit a Jupyter notebook with your analysis, along with a PDF report summarizing your findings. Include data visualizations and statistical analysis. Ensure your code is well-commented.
